name: vuepress-plugin-typedoc
description: A VuePress plugin to build api documentation with TypeDoc.

scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn run lint && yarn run build && yarn run test
scripts.test:init: rm -rf test/site && yarn create vuepress-site test/site
scripts.test:demo:start: yarn run build && cd test/site/docs && yarn run dev
scripts.test:demo:build: yarn run build && cd test/site/docs && yarn run build && npx http-server ./src/.vuepress/dist -o
scripts.build-and-test: npm run build && npm run test

author: Thomas Grey
